scripts.build-app: yarn run clean-app && yarn run copy-fluid-files && spago bundle-app --purs-args '--strict --censor-codes=UserDefinedWarning' --main App.Main --to dist/app/app.js
scripts.build-tests: yarn run clean-tests && spago bundle-app --purs-args '--strict --censor-codes=UserDefinedWarning' --main Test.Main --to dist/tests/app.js
scripts.build-app-tests: yarn run clean-app-tests && spago bundle-app --purs-args '--strict --censor-codes=UserDefinedWarning' --main Test.App.Main --to dist/app-tests/app.js
scripts.bundle-app: yarn run build-app && parcel build --no-minify -d dist/app --public-url
scripts.bundle-tests: yarn run build-tests && parcel build -d dist/tests tests.html
scripts.bundle-app-tests: yarn run build-app-tests && parcel build -d dist/app-tests app-tests.html
scripts.build-tests-watch: yarn run build-tests --watch && parcel watch tests.html
scripts.build-app-tests-watch: yarn run build-app-tests --watch && parcel watch app-tests.html
scripts.serve-app: yarn run build-app && parcel serve -d dist/app index.html
